import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in software_system]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system and word not in environment_object]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system and word not in environment_object and word not in external_system and word not in system_requirements]

```python
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+data\s+link"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:a|the)\s+(?:database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:support|have|be)\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[a-zA-Z\s]+)\s+data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities["Software System"]]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"]]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"]]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"]]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"] and item not in entities["System Requirements"]]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(physical device)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(environment object)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(external system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(system requirements)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(shared phenomena)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group().replace("the ", ""))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?terminal|device|link|card|disk"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?user|patient|sun|old"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?database|card|tap|disk"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?message|status|data"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?status|data"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

import json

def extract_entities(payload):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Split the payload into words
    words = payload.split()
    
    # Define the keywords for each entity type
    keywords = {
        "Software System": ["system", "software"],
        "Physical Device": ["sensor", "telemetry", "data", "output", "card", "disk"],
        "Environment Object": ["patient", "sun", "old"],
        "External System": ["database", "magnetic", "stripe", "tap", "hard"],
        "System Requirements": ["aim", "purpose", "develop"],
        "Shared Phenomena": ["event", "state", "value"]
    }
    
    # Iterate over each word in the payload
    for word in words:
        # Iterate over each entity type
        for entity_type, keywords_list in keywords.items():
            # Check if the word is in the list of keywords for the current entity type
            if word.lower() in keywords_list:
                # If it is, add the word to the list of entities for the current entity type
                entities[entity_type].append(word)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

# Test the function

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in entities["Software System"]]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"]]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"]]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"] and word not in entities["External System"]]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"] and word not in entities["External System"] and word not in entities["System Requirements"]]

    return entities
```

```python
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+data"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\s+include\s+.*\s+for\s+.*\s+objectives"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|app|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(device|computer|phone|server|database|hard disk|tap|magnetic stripe card)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|doctor|user|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|hard disk|tap|magnetic stripe card|system)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system

    # System Requirements
```python
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"]]

    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:be|export|disseminate|have|use|provide|generate|send|receive|get|access)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:video|file|image|data|information|message|communication)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:the|a|an)\s+(?:patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:database|card|disk|stripe)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:export|disseminate|generate|send|receive|get|access)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+(?:event|state|value)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+send\s+and\s+receive\s+annotated\s+and\s+un-annotated\s+digital\s+imagery"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"shared\s+events,\s+states\s+and\s+values"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in software_system]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]
    
    return entities
```

import re

```python
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+messages"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+capable\s+of\s+(.*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+messages"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)\s+system"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+the\s+capability\s+to\s+(?:review|have)\s+(?:incoming|un-annotated)\s+as\s+well\s+as\s+(?:annotated|un-annotated)\s+digital\s+imagery"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_device if device.lower() in ["server", "device", "computer", "machine"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_object if object.lower() in ["internet", "world", "environment"]]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_system if system.lower() in ["database", "card", "disk"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement.lower() in ["send", "receive", "review", "transmit"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomena for phenomena in shared_phenomena if phenomena.lower() in ["internet", "world", "environment"]]
    
    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send and receive messages to/from the server, which is a physical device, and the server is connected to the internet, and the internet is a shared phenomena."))
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bAV\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\bdatabase\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bshall be able to\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bdisplay\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bsend\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bdisplaying\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bstatus\b', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\bdata\b', sentence)
    system_requirements = [req.strip() for req in system_requirements]
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in software_systems]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in software_systems and object not in physical_devices]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in software_systems and system not in physical_devices and system not in environment_objects]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in software_systems and requirement not in physical_devices and requirement not in environment_objects and requirement not in external_systems]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
``` 

```python
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+allow\s+the\s+operator\s+to\s+control\s+and\s+monitor\s+the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Z][a-z]+)'s\s+FD/L"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+([A-Z][a-z]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"Original\s+Equipment\s+Manufacturer"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"control\s+and\s+monitor"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"if\s+required"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+(?:\s\w+)*)\s+(?:device|disk|card|media|system)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+(?:\s\w+)*)\s+(?:database|card|disk|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+allow\s+to\s+(?:install|update|upgrade)\s+software"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append("install software upgrades")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"as\s+well\s+as"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("shared events")

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(interface|receive|coordinate|send|get|store)\s*(with|from|to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities["Software System"].append(match[0])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(get|send|receive|store)\s*(data|information)\s*(from|to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(match[0])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*(the)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(match[0])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(store|receive|send|get)\s*(data|information)\s*(in|from|to)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities["External System"].append(match[0])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*shall\s*(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(match[1] + " " + match[2])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*(a)\s*(set)\s*of\s*(shared)\s*(events|states|values)\s*(between)\s*(the)\s*(connected)\s*(entities)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(match[0])

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [word for word in physical_device if word not in entities["Software System"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"]]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"] and word not in entities["External System"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in entities["Software System"] and word not in entities["Physical Device"] and word not in entities["Environment Object"] and word not in entities["External System"] and word not in entities["System Requirements"]]
    
    return entities
```

import re

        "Environment Object": [],

        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

```python
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Tactical Control System|JSTARS GSM)"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"JSTARS GSM"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+database|a\s+magnetic stripe card|a\s+tap|hard disk"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"provide the necessary hardware and software functionality to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with JSTARS GSM"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+set\s+of\s+shared\s+events|a\s+set\s+of\s+shared\s+states|a\s+set\s+of\s+shared\s+values"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"JMCIS"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"provide\s+the\s+necessary\s+hardware\s+and\s+software\s+functionality\s+to\s+allow\s+the\s+Tactical\s+Control\s+System\s+to\s+integrate\s+with\s+JMCIS"

    # Shared Phenomena

    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:Tactical|System|Control|JSIPS-N)\s+System"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:Tactical|System|Control|JSIPS-N)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|patient|sun|old)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:provide|necessary|hardware|software|functionality|allow|integrate)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:set|events|states|values)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
    physical_device_pattern = r"hardware|software|data|information|device"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Physical Device"].append(re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:patient|sun|old)"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Environment Object"].append(re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence).group())

    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities["External System"].append(re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence).group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"integrate|allow|provide"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence):
        entities["System Requirements"].append(re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence).group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"events|states|values|connected|entities"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence):
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence).group())

    return entities
```

        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

```python
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:AFMSS|System)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+provide\s+the\s+necessary\s+hardware\s+and\s+software\s+functionality\s+to\s+allow\s+the\s+Tactical\s+Control\s+System\s+to\s+integrate\s+with\s+AFMSS"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:set\s+of\s+shared\s+events|set\s+of\s+shared\s+states|set\s+of\s+shared\s+values)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\bhardware\b|\bsoftware\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\bthe\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\bintegrate\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*Tactical Control System"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Software System"].append("Tactical Control System")

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"ETRAC"
    if re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Physical Device"].append("ETRAC")

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*patient|the\s+(?:the)?\s*sun|the\s+(?:the)?\s*old"
    if re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Environment Object"].append("patient")
        entities["Environment Object"].append("sun")
        entities["Environment Object"].append("old")

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+database|a\s+magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|a\s+tap|hard\s+disk"
    if re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["External System"].append("database")
        entities["External System"].append("magnetic stripe card")
        entities["External System"].append("tap")
        entities["External System"].append("hard disk")

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"provide\s+the\s+necessary\s+hardware\s+and\s+software\s+functionality\s+to\s+allow\s+the\s+Tactical\s+Control\s+System\s+to\s+integrate\s+with\s+ETRAC"
    if re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["System Requirements"].append("provide the necessary hardware and software functionality to allow the Tactical Control System to integrate with ETRAC")

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"a\s+set\s+of\s+shared\s+events,\s+states\s+and\s+values\s+between\s+the\s+connected\s+entities"
    if re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append("a set of shared events, states and values between the connected entities")

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+provisions\s+for\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+phenomena"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"shall\s+(?:as\s+a\s+minimum)?\s+(?:allow\s+)?(?:Operator|operator|operator\(s\))\s+to\s+(?:print|Print)\s+(?P<software_system>.+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group("software_system"))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?P<physical_device>Printer)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group("physical_device"))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?P<environment_object>the\s+patient|the\s+sun|the\s+old)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group("environment_object"))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?P<external_system>C4I\s+Messages|Mission\s+Plans|FD/L\s+information|current\s+map\s+display)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group("external_system"))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?P<system_requirements>allow\s+Operator\(s\)\s+to\s+print)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group("system_requirements"))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?P<shared_phenomena>freeze-frame\s+video)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group("shared_phenomena"))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the)?\s*(\w+)\s+system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+equipment"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)\s+operating\s+environment"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+the\s+functionality\s+to\s+(\w+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Split the sentence into words
    words = sentence.split()
    
    # Loop through each word
    for word in words:
        # Check if the word is a software system
        if word.lower() == "system":
            entities["Software System"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a physical device
        elif word.lower() == "device":
            entities["Physical Device"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an environment object
        elif word.lower() == "object":
            entities["Environment Object"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is an external system
        elif word.lower() == "system":
            entities["External System"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a system requirement
        elif word.lower() == "requirement":
            entities["System Requirements"].append(word)
        # Check if the word is a shared phenomenon
        elif word.lower() == "phenomenon":
            entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(word)
    
    # Return the entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
def extract_entities(sentence):

    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_devices
    
    # Environment Object

    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_objects
    
    # External System

    entities["External System"] = external_systems
    
    # System Requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(shared events|states|values|connected entities)\b', sentence)
``` 

```python
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+[a-z\s]*\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [item for item in physical_device if item not in entities["Software System"]]
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [item for item in environment_object if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"]]
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [item for item in external_system if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"]]
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [item for item in system_requirements if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"]]
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [item for item in shared_phenomena if item not in entities["Software System"] and item not in entities["Physical Device"] and item not in entities["Environment Object"] and item not in entities["External System"] and item not in entities["System Requirements"]]
    
    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
```
```python
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)\s+System"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?(\w+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(\w+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+provide\s+([a-zA-Z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+shall\s+provide"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities["Software System"].append(match.split("shall provide")[0].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+shall\s+provide\s+data/information"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(match.split("shall provide")[0].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(match.strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )*(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+that\s+can\s+store\s+data\s+messages"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities["External System"].append(match.split("that can store data messages")[0].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+provide\s+([A-Za-z\s]+)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(match.strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z\s]+)\s+between\s+the\s+connected\s+entities"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(match.strip())

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in software_systems]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object not in physical_devices and object not in software_systems]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in physical_devices and system not in software_systems and system not in environment_objects]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement not in physical_devices and requirement not in software_systems and requirement not in environment_objects and requirement not in external_systems]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon not in physical_devices and phenomenon not in software_systems and phenomenon not in environment_objects and phenomenon not in external_systems]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(device|network|database)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(personnel|patient|sun|old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(protection|communicate|send)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(injury|network|data)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:tactical|system|software)\s+control\s+system"
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE):
        entities["Software System"].append("Tactical Control System")

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:keyboard|printer)"
    physical_devices = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"].extend(physical_devices)

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:patient|sun|old)"
    environment_objects = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"].extend(environment_objects)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\sdisk)"
    external_systems = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"].extend(external_systems)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:safety|health|hazards)"
    system_requirements = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["System Requirements"].extend(system_requirements)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:events|states|values)"
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"].extend(shared_phenomena)

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sSystem"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sdevice"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sobject"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\ssystem"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\srequirement"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sphenomena"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|Tactical Data Link System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Tactical Data Link System)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

    return result_json

# Test the function
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+System"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:based|board|ship|land|shelter|system)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:based|board|ship|land|shelter|system)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:database|card|disk|tap|stripe)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\scapable\sof\s+(?:operation|design|document)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+(?:events|states|values)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
```

```python
        "Software System": [],

        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sdevice"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:

    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1).strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1).strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"to\sbe\sable\sto\s([A-Za-z0-9\s,]+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1).strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\sphenomena"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1).strip())

    return entities

# Test
```

    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System

    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s*be\s*able\s*to\s*(\w+)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group().replace("the ", "").replace("system", "").strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:generator|source|card|disk|tap|interface|device|system)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:patient|sun|old|object|entity)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group().replace("the ", "").replace("a ", "").strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:database|card|disk|tap|interface|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(?:shall|should|can|be able to)\s+(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:communicate|input|output|display|process)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities["System Requirements"].append(system_requirements_match.group().replace("shall", "").replace("should", "").replace("can", "").replace("be able to", "").strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:\w+\s+){0,2}(?:event|state|value|information|data)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
``` 

```python
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Environment Object

    entities["Environment Object"] = [word for word in environment_object if word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [word for word in external_system if word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [word for word in system_requirements if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z]*\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [word for word in shared_phenomena if word not in external_system and word not in environment_object and word not in physical_device and word not in software_system]

    return entities
```
